title: Out of range
body: After the new update i get a "out of range" problem , little help somebody?

replies.body: create a custom or in game and  when your monitor goes "out of range". Alt+Enter to go windows mode and then you can adjust screen settings and the display settings on your monitor. I hope this will help with your monitor problems.

It's not working for me ;-;

I fixed it verry simple and and it looks like fullscreen. Simply go to your game directory "C:/Riot games/League of legends/Config/game.cfg" look for "Windowed = 0" line -> change 0 with 2. Close notepad, when asked for save choose yes, then right click "game.cfg" and check "Read only" ->Apply->OK .
I don't think someone will resolve this problem...
After so much time i still have the problem , i can't play widescreen bc periodically my fps decrease to 10 or 5 which is so annoying...

I am having dreadful troubles with both League clients.
The older client works up until the game is about to load the characters into the gameplay screen, then my monitor displays "out of range" and no way to use Alt+Enter to escape from this. 
If you do wait and listen though, it loads into the game with the usual starting sounds you hear when in gameplay, but you an't see anything other than "Out of range". 
The only way to get out of this screen is hit "Alt+Esc" and it will flip back into the windows screen. 
You are not able to play the game therefore when I try to close it, it punishes me for leaving the game with AFK. But I don't think this is fair at all because I'm trying to play it and your client won't allow me to!

Also, after restarting my PC, I'm having issues where after the League client has messed up my video display, the screen will boot up and when going into windows, it will then display "Out of range" again! I had to start in Safe mode with low video resolution in order to fix this bug you seem to have with your client. Please can you kindly look into this for me because it appears I'm not the only person having trouble with it.

The new client btw doesn't display correctly on the welcome screen on my PC so I'd have to set the video resolution majorly high to fit it on the screen! Chaos! Then.... you ban Teemo... I paid for him with IP and he's my main... so not happy :(
I saw this on service status : We have disabled Teemo due to in game issues, and are currently working on a resolution. Can I ask WHICH is this resolution????
No , i still need to restart my pc and league of legends doesn`t work , so i`ll need to wait until next update? :((

We're currently investigating this issue per the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na).  In the meantime, pressing Alt+Enter in-game should fix this up.  Let me know if that works for you.
